full_summary:
# Solicitation Notice

**Solicitation Number:** WS4030735112
**Title:** Environmental Site Investigations - Ipperwash - Sol. B
**Published Date:** May 29, 2023
**Closing Date:** June 13, 2023

**Introduction:**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites proposals for Environmental Site Assessments (ESA), Human Health and Ecological Risk Assessments (HHERA), and Risk Management Services for the Clearance and Remediation Former Camp Ipperwash (FCI) at Stoney Point.

**Description:**
This solicitation includes providing services on an as-and-when-requested basis upon receipt of a Task Authorization from the Department of National Defence. The period of the contract extends to March 31, 2025, with irrevocable options to extend it for up to three additional one-year periods.

**Services Required:**
To respond to this solicitation, offerors are expected to provide the following services:

* Environmental Site Assessments (ESA)
* Human Health and Ecological Risk Assessments (HHERA)
* Risk Management Services

**Submission Requirements:**
Offerors interested in participating in this solicitation must submit their proposals in electronic format. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Note:**
This solicitation cancels and supersedes previous solicitation number Doc3870604668 dated February 13, 2023. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to Offeroers who offered on the previous solicitation.

**Location of Work:**
Work will be performed in Ontario, excluding the National Capital Region.

**Contracting Authority:**
This solicitation is conducted by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

**Point of Contact:**
Webster, Sean (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [sean.webster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sean.webster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Additional Information:**
Please visit the discovery.ariba.com website for more information on this solicitation.
